content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Purpose\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To establish an objective governing standard for EPAM Systems Inc. (EPAM, Company) and all of its subsidiaries as it relates to Travel, Entertainment, and Expense Reimbursement. This Global Travel, Entertainment, and Expense Reimbursement Policy (Policy) supersedes all relevant sections of local policies where conflicts exist.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The policy may be amended at any time and EPAM may depart from it, depending on the circumstances.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Scope, Adherence and Responsibilities\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This policy applies to all EPAM employees and contractors, regardless of length of service, worldwide, without exception. Strict adherence to this Policy is a condition of employment or contracting with EPAM worldwide. Compliance with the Policy will allow employees and contractors to be compensated timely and fairly for the incurred expenses. Compliance with the Policy will allow the Company to safeguard its assets, maintain appropriate accounting records, timely invoice customers, and fulfill its contractual obligations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees are expected to be conservative in their spending and approvers are expected to be diligent in their review and verification of all expense reports. An employee or contractor incurring business expense is expected to exercise the same care as a prudent individual making expenditures for personal reasons. Further, employees are responsible for the authenticity and accuracy of their expense report contents. Incomplete, unsupported or unapproved expense reports will not be processed for payment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The CTC Group is responsible to ensure travel and entertainment related expenses are properly authorized (based on data in CTC), accurately recorded, and data is timely provided to appropriate payroll personnel. The Finance and Internal Audit departments may also monitor policy compliance and perform audits on travel and entertainment expenses.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Definitions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business allowable expense:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" a necessary, reasonable, and appropriate expense incurred for the primary benefit of the EPAM business and therefore permitted to be reimbursed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Original receipt:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" the original merchant receipt or invoice issued by the supplier or service provider to document and substantiate the business transaction. When the original receipt is not available or does not contain adequate information, a cancelled check, credit card receipt, supplier statement, or a paid notice will be accepted.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reasonable expense:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" an expense that is ordinary and reflects a prudent decision (not extreme or excessive) to incur the expense on behalf of EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expense fraud:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" any falsification on an expense claim is a form of fraud, which is a criminal offense and renders the employee liable to disciplinary actions up to and including dismissal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. Enforcement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Chief Compliance Officer, Global Expense Management (GEM) Group, and Company Management are charged with monitoring and enforcement of the Policy on a continuous basis.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.1. Methods of Enforcement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company reserves the right to enforce the Policy by performing one or combination of the following actions:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) reject inappropriate or incorrect expense report (and demand repayment if the rejected expenditure was made with the Company funds);\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) suspend the employee in violation of the company Policy, when it is necessary to make a full investigation to determine the facts of the case;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) issue verbal or written warning with possible escalation of the issue to resource manager and HR;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) conduct payroll deductions of the employee's salary to reimburse the Company for the overpayment as a result of the violation of the Policy;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) temporarily or permanently remove employee in violation of the company Policy from the Corporate Credit Card program;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f) temporarily or permanently remove the employee in violation of the company Policy from all Company bonus or promotional considerations;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.2. Legal Compliance\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The traveler or expense originator is responsible for compliance with all local and federal laws. Any expenses resulting from non-compliance with the laws and regulations will not be reimbursed without exception.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. Help\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an employee or contractor encounters any difficulty or has a question that relates to Travel, Entertainment, or Expense reimbursement CTC Group can be contacted at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACostTracking@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACostTracking@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6. Expense Reporting\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All travel and entertainment expense reports must be completed using CTC and will not be processed through any other methods. Personal expenses will not be reimbursed and if included in an expense report will be deducted from the reimbursement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when reporting business expenses:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) All expense reports should be submitted on a per trip basis. If you have additional expenses in a month not related to a specific business trip, those items should be submitted through a monthly expense report;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) All expenses must be reported in CTC system within 2 weeks of travel completion or date of expense incurred (unless it is advance purchase for a future event. For example: airfare purchased in advance for a trip that will take place in a few months);\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Expense reports should be completed and submitted for verification in accordance with CTC quality and completeness guidelines;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) Employees are responsible for accurate allocation of their travel and entertainment expenses to the correct expense category. CTC functionality shall be open to users to make appropriate modifications. Any error in the expense allocation is the responsibility of the employee;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) The Company requires PDF scans of original receipts for as substantiation for expenses. Receipt details, at a minimum, must include date, location, amount, and taxes (if applicable). Additionally, receipts should be clear as to expense type. Due to statutory requirements receipts are required for all expenses incurred by CIS region employees. For expenditures incurred by non-CIS region employees on Corporate Credit card under $25 (or its equivalent in local currency) and meals and transportation charges under $25 (or its equivalent in local currency) receipts are not required. Note that all meal charges over $25 must be supported by receipts (or comments in CTC) with clear explanation as to business purpose and attendees;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f) All employees are personally responsible to obtain and keep valid receipts for their business expenses. In case the receipt is lost or stolen, the Company will reject or approve the expense on its own discretion;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g) The Company understands that in certain cases receipts are unobtainable or cannot be obtained timely (for example: taxi receipts in CIS region or EZ Pass statements in US). In such cases detailed comments must be provided, as a part of the expense report, providing the reasons for the missing supporting documentation. Depending on the nature of the expense and the reasons provided the expense item will be approved or rejected by the approval manager. If the Expense Report is rejected due to a particular issue, the expense originator must provide necessary corrections within 1 week of the rejection;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"h) Any out-of-pocket expenses not reported within 3 months of incurrence will be ineligible for reimbursement regardless of business nature without exception.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7. Expense Approval\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The expenses are to be reviewed by the appropriate approver designated in CTC within 1 week after verification. The approver has responsibility for review and approval of the expenses and approval certifies that the expense:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"was for a legitimate business purpose\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"was reviewed in details; and\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is in compliance with the Polic\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to travel, the traveler or other party involved in travel preparations must submit a Business Trip form in CTC system. Travel arrangements should not be made prior to approval by traveler's supervisor or resource manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Under no circumstances the self-approvals of expense reports are allowed regardless of employee's authority level. If such case is identified CTC group should be notified immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NOTE: The ability to charge an expense (whether rebillable to the client or not) against a project DOES NOT allow for the violation of any provision in this policy. It is still considered a corporate expense and MUST be in compliance.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8. Monitoring\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the Expense Report is not completed within 2 weeks of travel completion or expense incurrence (when Corporate Card or cash advance was provided) the employee will receive an automatically generated warning. From the time of warning the expense originator will have 1 week to complete the outstanding expense report.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the expense report is not completed within 2 weeks, the reporting manager will be notified. Each week additional notices will be sent to the reporting manager and after 4 weeks will be reported to the Chief Compliance Officer as a part of a Weekly Violations Report. The Chief Compliance Officer is authorized to enforce the policy with all methods outlined in the \\\"Methods of Enforcement\\\" section.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If expense report is not completed in 2 months, the employee's corporate card will be deactivated until delinquent reports are completed. Corporate credit card privilege may be suspended permanently if violations are deemed significant.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The CTC group will be reviewing and analyzing all expenses for reasonableness and potentially questioning business purpose, if not clearly stated or obvious. Any items that are determined to be inappropriate will be rejected and escalated to the appropriate level, up to and including the CEO. Routine exception reports will be provided to the Corporate Controller and the Global Chief Compliance Officer compliance officer and other members of senior management to ensure the compliance with the Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9. Methods of Payment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.1 Corporate Credit Card\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Credit Card (\\\"Card\\\") is provided to assist employees in effective fulfillment of their duties. Employees will be required to read and sign, if applicable, a cardholder agreement prior to receiving the Card. Violation of any aspect of this policy may result in the suspension and/or cancellation of the Company credit card. Please note that the provision of the Card is not meant to replace the regular Accounts Payable process.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card usage for personal expenses is prohibited. If it occurs, the user should notify CTC Group immediately.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following are general guidelines related to the Card usage:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) Lost, stolen, or damaged Cards must be reported to CTC Group immediately;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Absolutely no ATM Cash withdrawals or Cash Advances are allowed without exception;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) No charges on behalf of others (unless it is a group meal) are allowed without exception. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of a group meal, the most senior employee in attendance must be responsible for paying the bill\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\";\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) Any employee with unreported Card charges older than 2 months will have their Card deactivated until all delinquent reports are completed. Corporate Card privilege may be suspended indefinitely;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) Corporate Credit Card may not be linked to any electronic payment system such as Paypal, Yandex Money, WU, etc. Such linkage, if identified, will result in immediate suspension of Corporate Credit Card privilege;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f) Habitual violations will result in disciplinary actions specified in \\\"Methods of Enforcement\\\" section based on the judgment of management and severity of the violation;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g) The Cards may be provided to EPAM employees only (i.e. the cards cannot be issued to contractors or non-employees).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.2 Applying for a Corporate Credit Card\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an employee reasonably estimates that job duty fulfillment will require expense incurrence they should:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss the situation with their supervisor (Resource Manager);\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Seek and obtain their supervisor's approval;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Submit a written request with supervisor's approval to the Help Desk (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFTITHelpDesk@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFTITHelpDesk@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.3 Other Means of Payment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are occasions when:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) Corporate Credit Card is not accepted (for example cash only places);\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Employees and contractors who were not issued the Corporate Credit Card incurred expenses;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Employee or contractor chooses to use personal means of payment due to convenience factor.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In such cases the expenses will be reimbursed if they were for a valid business reason and appropriate proof was provided in accordance with CTC guidelines.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10. Travel - This is not meant to be an exhaustive list; the bottom line is that cost control should always be a primary consideration in how business travel is conducted at EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.1 Cost Control\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM will reimburse traveling and subsistence expenses necessarily incurred for business purposes only. The Company expects its employees and contractors to exercise their best judgment and conservatism when making expenditures. While no per Diem limit is established (unless specified by a local policy or law), reasonableness of costs should always be a primary consideration.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to minimize travel costs, employees must be flexible with their schedule, clearly communicate their and their clients' needs to the travel teams and consider all options available to make an informed decision.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some examples (not all) of exercising sound judgment and flexibility:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First and foremost, there should be absolutely valid and necessary reason for the business trip;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If several employees are traveling from airport to destinations in the same geographic areas, they have to share transportation;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Car rental capacity should be maximized;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Best prices on hotels should always be researched using either travel group, and verified by using the variety of online reservation resources;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.2 Visa, Travel Permits, and Insurance\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Visa and Travel Permits must be arranged through EPAM Global or Local Travel Group without exception. All reasonable costs related to a Visa or Travel Permit generation will be compensated.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Medical or Travel Insurance is reimbursable if legally required for international travel.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.3 Air Travel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travel should be arranged through EPAM Global or Local Travel Group whenever possible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to airfare:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) The most moderate rate appropriate via a direct route should be chosen and coach/economy class should always be chosen. One-way or refundable tickets purchasing should be limited to a minimum;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) The usage of booking services or travel agencies should be kept to a minimum and utilized only in situations where travel arrangements are complex. Service fees may be disallowed if deemed inappropriate by the CTC Team review.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) All airline tickets must be purchased as far in advance as possible (at least 14 days) in order to obtain advance purchase discounts and optimal travel times;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) When travel plans must be changed due to unforeseen circumstances (e.g. the change has been requested by a customer), the traveler is responsible for notifying the airline that booked the ticket immediately to apply the necessary changes;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) If the travelers wish to upgrade/change the level of service they can do that at personal expense or by using their \\\"frequent flyer\\\" points;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f) All upgrades (for example: extra leg room or business class) shall be done at traveler's expense unless pre-approved by Executive Management;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g) Reasonable luggage fees (1 bag per travel week up to 3 bags total trip maximum) will be reimbursed. Luggage overweight fees are not reimbursable;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"h) No inflight purchases are compensated;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"i) The usage of airport lounges is generally not reimbursable unless a valid business reason exists;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"j) Travelers must submit boarding pass and receipt (eTicket receipt) to receive reimbursement;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"k) Travel insurance can be purchased if appropriate (e.g. there is a probability of trip cancellation).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.4 Train and Bus Service\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travel by rail and bus is allowed when it is less expensive than alternative means of transportation and not as a matter of personal convenience.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to train and bus travel:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) Travel should always be in coach/economy/coupe class unless a good reason exists for a higher class travel;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Reasonable charges in case of overnight travel such as meals, linens, etc. will be compensated;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Central travel support should be utilized when possible to optimize costs;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) Travelers must submit train tickets and receipts to receive reimbursement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.5 Personal Automobile\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The use of personal vehicle for business purposes is allowed when it is less expensive than alternative means of transportation and not as a matter of personal convenience. The use of personal automobile for normal commute to and from employee's place of work is not an allowable expense.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to the personal automobile usage:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) Reimbursement will be in accordance with the mileage rate established by the tax authority or regulation;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Only the mileage in excess of regular commute will be reimbursed;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Fuel reimbursement cannot be reimbursed in addition to mileage (unless dictated by local tax authority);\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) Reasonable tolls, ferry charges, etc. will be reimbursed;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) Regular car maintenance, fines, penalties, towing, and repairs are not allowable expenses and will not be reimbursed under no circumstances;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f) When traveling on Company business the traveler must comply with all local driving regulations. Under no circumstances the Company will reimburse fines or damages;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g) Company does not cover purchases and installations of GPS or Navigation systems;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"h) Traveler must have valid insurance if legally required. EPAM does not reimburse personal insurance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"i) Traveler's driving license and copy of car insurance must be made available to the Company upon request.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.6 Car Rental\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Rental cars should be used when they are less expensive than alternative means of transportation (e.g. taxi, car service, or train) and not as a matter of personal convenience. Vehicle rentals should be used when public transportation or company provided vehicles are unavailable or inadequate.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to car rentals:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) Car Rentals are allowed only in Europe and North America and only if personal automobile or taxi is not a logical solution. Car Rentals in CIS region are permitted only upon written pre-approval from Executive Management. Absence of preapproval will result in disallowance of CIS Car Rental expense;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Car Rentals should be done from a known brand vendor (Enterprise Rent-A-Car and National are preferred vendors in North America and should be utilized whenever possible);\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Compact/Economy size or its equivalent must be chosen if less than 4 employees are traveling together. All vehicle upgrades and extra amenities are at renter's expense;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) All Car Rentals by EPAM employees \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"MUST\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" be paid with the Card without exception because of the insurance benefits provided by the Card. No other payment methods are allowed. It is employee's responsibility to request the Card in advance if Car Rental will be required. Company external contractors may utilize any method of payment;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) All insurances offered by the Car Rental agencies must be declined and the whole car rental expense will be disallowed if insurances are chosen;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f) Car rentals purchased with the company Card have the following insurance coverage: damages to the rental vehicle – through Visa, 3rd party liability – through EPAM Global corporate insurance;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g) Personal items are left in the car entirely at the employee's own risk and the company does not accept any liability for loss, theft or damage of personal items;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"h) All rental vehicles should be operated in a safe manner including proper use of seatbelts and obeying all traffic laws. It is the traveler's responsibility to be aware of local transportation regulations;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"i) Company reimburses reasonable fuel charges;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"j) Rented vehicles must be returned with a full gas tank. The Company does not reimburse any fees charged due to a vehicle return with unfilled gas tank without exception.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"k) In case of an accident, defects or damage to the vehicle, any theft or loss of the car, any road accident, in which the employee may be involved whilst driving the rental car, whether or not that occurred on the Company's business, any fixed penalty notices or any other event which results in the employee being neglecting to the rental vehicle, the traveler must notify CTC Group, reporting manager, rental company and Corporate card administrator immediately;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"l) Full car rental receipt and rental agreement that specifies all final charges incurred must be provided with the expense report;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"m) Failure to observe these rules or failure to use the rentals in a reasonable and responsible manner may result in the Company withdrawing the authorization to use rental services from the employee concerned. In addition, failure to observe these rules will be regarded as a disciplinary offence and will be dealt with according to EPAM disciplinary procedure.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.7 Parking\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to parking:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) When applicable, economy or long-term parking should be utilized;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Valet and short-term parking should be avoided whenever possible;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) The Company does not reimburse parking fines without exception;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) The Company does not reimburse for any damages incurred while the personal vehicle was parked.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.8 Taxis, Chauffeur Driver and Other Means of Transport\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to Taxi and Other Transport:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) Preferred vendor used by the Central or Local travel group should be utilized;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Taxi fares incurred when traveling on business can be claimed in full, when it is not practical to use other forms of transport. Waiting time costs cannot be claimed;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Employees must state the starting point and destination of all taxi journeys. Failure to do this may lead to the expense being rejected;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) While the Company realizes that in many cases taxi receipts are hard to obtain, the traveler should always request them and provide comments in the expense report when they are not available;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) The use of chauffeur services when cost is comparable to regular taxi service is allowed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.9 Fines, Penalties and Legal Fees\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM does not pay any fines or penalties (including, but not limited to, parking and speeding fines) on behalf of its employees. The employee is responsible for the payment of all fines incurred (including parking and speeding fines), and the employee accepts that EPAM can deduct the cost of such fines from the wages.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All legal expenses and time commitments (for example court hearings) are considered to be individual's personal aspect regardless of circumstances under which they were incurred.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.10 Accommodations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is the Company's policy to negotiate discounted accommodation rates at frequently traveled locations and employees are required to make use of preferred accommodations whenever possible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to accommodations:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) When traveling for a lengthy period extended stay arrangements should be utilized. Local Travel Group should be contacted in such cases or if special needs exist;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Corporate accommodation should be used where appropriate;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Hotels should be chosen with most reasonable balance of price, quality, and location;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) Travelers should stay in standard rooms only. Only complimentary upgrades should be accepted. All other upgrades should be done at traveler's own cost;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e) When accommodation plans must be changed due to unforeseen circumstances the traveler is responsible for notifying the hotel or the Travel team immediately to apply the necessary changes;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f) Amenities for extra fees (for example: movies, sauna, gym, pool, etc.) are not reimbursable;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g) Reasonable internet charges are reimbursable;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"h) Reasonable gratuity is reimbursable;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"i) Reasonable laundry and/or dry cleaning charges are reimbursable only if travel exceeds 1 week;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"j) Long-distance phone charges from the hotel room are not reimbursable;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"k) Room mini-bar and cable TV on-demand charges are not reimbursable without exception;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"l) Full hotel folio specifying all charges incurred must be provided with the expense report. Travelers are encouraged to request such receipts prior to check-out and discuss/challenge any discrepancies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.11 Weekend, Holiday, and Extended Travel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company realizes that the business needs may require an employee or contractor occasionally travel on the weekend or holiday and/or spend a weekend away from home. While it is unfortunate, it is the reality and a part of the employment condition at EPAM. The Company does not provide allowances for a weekend travel.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On exception basis, travel bonuses may be provided if properly authorized by Corporate and Account Management. Such bonuses will be considered regular taxable compensation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.12 Per Diem\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Per Diem is intended to cover all meal and non-business expenses (for example transportation). If the local law, regulation or customer contract requires the traveler to utilize per diem limits, then the applicable Local Travel Policy or Customer contract should be followed. Otherwise, please refer to the appropriate section of the Policy for the expense type in question. Under no circumstances can the traveler claim per diem and reimbursement for items to be covered by the per diem on the same trip.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.13 Telephone Charges\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travelers will be reimbursed for reasonable business phone calls that are necessary for conducting business. This includes reimbursement for personal telephone calls allowing the traveler to stay in reasonable contact with their family unless not covered by per diem already. The use of air phones will not be reimbursed without exception.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company strongly encourages all travelers to utilize free/budget communication options (SKYPE in particular). EPAM only reimburses reasonable and necessary charges. Anything deemed excessive will not be reimbursed. Itemized telephone bills are required to support these expense claims when submitting an expense report in CTC.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.14 Meals\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is the Company's policy to reimburse the actual cost of meals incurred, provided they are reasonable and do not exceed the respective local meal reimbursement guideline (if applicable).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to meals (and when per diem is not prescribed by local law):\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"During a group meal the most senior Company employee present will be responsible for the bill;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meals should be kept to a reasonable amount;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Breakfast is reimbursable during travel and if the hotel does not provide it as a part of the overall rate;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reasonable Lunch and Dinner charges are reimbursable;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The use of alcohol for business meals and entertainment purposes should be kept to a minimu Alcohol charges that are supported by a valid receipt are reimbursable up to $10/person/day limit;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reasonable gratuities are covered;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Receipts should support all meal expenses and should contain the list of all purchased item Credit card receipt alone is not enough to serve as support for expenditure;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Explanation in CTC MUST specify all attendees and the meal purpose;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Grocery shopping during travel is limited to $20/week maximum and receipts with detail breakdown of expense items must be provided for reimbursement;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travel and meals for an employee's spouse and/or dependents is not an allowable business expens\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11. Client Entertainment and Business Gifts\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Client or business entertaining means hospitality of any kind provided by EPAM or its employees to non-Company employees or contractors in connection with the lawful business of the Company. All client entertaining expenses must be preapproved by the appropriate level Manager and will be closely monitored by the Company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These guidelines should be followed when related to Client Entertainment:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following specific details are required on the expense report: type of entertainment (lunch, drinks, dinner, et); names and titles of guests; company affiliation (s) of people attending, cost, date and place; and business purpose and business relationship of individuals entertained;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No adult entertainment is allowed without exceptio\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Entertainment and /or gifts should be reasonable and fully comply with the Company Code of Conduct (and government/tax regulations, if applicable). The entertaining party must comply with all local laws and regulations (Refer to the Company Code of Conduct and Gifts and Entertainment policy for more details.).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company takes compliance with FCPA, UK Anti-Bribery Act, and similar regulations very seriously and if any questions exist, Global Chief Compliance Officer or General Counsel should be contacted immediately.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12. Other\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note the following items as integral part of the overall policy:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM allows the travelers to keep the rewards resulting from the participation in various programs;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM will not reimburse items such as:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any membership fees in travel airline membership clubs, Diners Club cards or other programs, golf clubs, interest groups, et;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Special recognition gifts (for example flowers on Secretary's Day or Holiday Cards);\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Consumable goods – cigarettes, toilet articles, etc;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal entertainment – theater, hotel movies, etc;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Commuting costs to/from home and normal place of business;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Costs incurred by unreasonable failure to cancel reservations;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Decorative furnishings for personal office spaces;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Barbers, hairdressers or spa services (massage, facials, et);\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal expenses incurred at home as a result of being away on Company business are not reimburse Examples include lawn care, snow removal, baby-sitter's fees, boarding for pets, rent, utilities, etc;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal bar bills;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Golf fees (except when part of customer entertainment expense), golf bags, and other sporting equipment;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Doctor's bills, prescriptions or other medical
